title: Sunny, top floor 1 bedroom, 1 bath - 10 months re-let lease
posting_body: Beautiful, top floor 1BR/1bath apartment with unique, open layout.
You get amazing morning southeast sun year-round in the kitchen and bedroom.
Large living room and separate dining room.
Bedroom big enough for king bed (as shown in pictures).
Access to laundry in the building.
Heat and water is included in rent.
The building has parking spots for rent, depending on availability.
I rented a garage spot further down the alley for the 7 years I lived here.
Cats and small dogs under 35lbs are allowed; $200 pet fee for dogs.
Since this is a re-let situation, you would finish out the length of my lease (10 months, through 6/30/23) with the option to renew.
You would also take over the apartment "as-is".
There is an administrative fee of $375 to secure the apartment and move in.
Text with questions or to arrange a viewing.
